mapper.select: SELECT u.email AS email, u.user_icon AS userIcon, u.user_name AS userName, real_name AS realName, u.user_id AS userId FROM t_user u, t_user_project up WHERE u.user_id = up.user_id AND up.project_id = #{projectId}
